stories.Title: No more AI detection
stories.Description: OpenAI's ambitious project to combat AI-generated content ended in disappointment. The company has decided to quietly retire its AI Classifier due to accuracy issues.
stories.Tweet: No more AI detection 📦 OpenAI's ambitious project to combat AI-generated content ended in disappointment. The company has decided to quietly retire its AI Classifier due to accuracy issues. #openai https://decrypt.co/149826/openai-quietly-shutters-its-ai-detection-tool

stories.Title: Cohere launches Coral
stories.Description: With its focus on proprietary data and strong privacy measures, Coral sets a new standard in the world of AI knowledge assistants, revolutionizing business operations.
stories.Tweet: Cohere launches Coral 📦 With its focus on proprietary data and strong privacy measures, Coral sets a new standard in the world of AI knowledge assistants, revolutionizing business operations. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/cohere-releases-coral-ai-assistant-designed-for-enterprise-business-use/

stories.Title: A cosmic rendezvous
stories.Description: Atomos Space is all set to transform space transportation with its spacecraft Quark and Gluon. Demonstrating autonomous rendezvous, docking, and refueling.
stories.Tweet: A cosmic rendezvous 📦 Atomos Space is all set to transform space transportation with its spacecraft Quark and Gluon. Demonstrating autonomous rendezvous, docking, and refueling. #rocketscience https://techcrunch.com/2023/07/25/atomos-space-books-launch-to-demonstrate-rendezvous-docking-and-refueling-in-orbit/

stories.Title: Delayed delivery from space
stories.Description: After a successful launch, Varda is ready to retrieve its microgravity-produced crystals. However, the startup awaits a Federal Aviation Administration license to bring the results down to Earth.
stories.Tweet: Delayed delivery from space 📦 After a successful launch, Varda is ready to retrieve its microgravity-produced crystals. However, the startup awaits a Federal Aviation Administration license to bring the results down to Earth. #varda https://spacenews.com/varda-waiting-on-faa-license-to-return-space-manufacturing-capsule/

stories.Title: Artemis is one step closer to liftoff
stories.Description: NASA's Artemis launch team simulates the first crewed mission, Artemis II, at Kennedy Space Center. With every scenario tested, they're ready to ensure a successful journey to the Moon.
stories.Tweet: Artemis is one step closer to liftoff 📦 NASA's Artemis launch team simulates the first crewed mission, Artemis II, at Kennedy Space Center. With every scenario tested, they're ready to ensure a successful journey to the Moon. #NASA https://www.nasa.gov/feature/nasa-completes-first-launch-simulation-for-artemis-ii-moon-mission/

stories.Title: New heights for Starship
stories.Description: NASA and SpaceX's latest collaboration opens up a world of possibilities for Starship. Beyond lunar missions, Starlink, and more, it could be repurposed as a commercial space station.
stories.Tweet: New heights for Starship 📦 NASA and SpaceX's latest collaboration opens up a world of possibilities for Starship. Beyond lunar missions, Starlink, and more, it could be repurposed as a commercial space station. #spacex https://arstechnica.com/space/2023/07/could-spacex-turn-starship-into-a-space-station/

stories.Title: Water vapor unveiled by Webb
stories.Description: The James Webb Space Telescope has spotted water in the PDS 70 system's inner disk, where rocky exoplanets could be forming. A discovery that unravels water and life's origins beyond Earth.
stories.Tweet: Water vapor unveiled by Webb 📦 The James Webb Space Telescope has spotted water in the PDS 70 system's inner disk, where rocky exoplanets could be forming. A discovery that unravels water and life's origins beyond Earth. #NASA https://www.nasa.gov/feature/goddard/2023/webb-detects-water-vapor-in-rocky-planet-forming-zone

stories.Title: Are you ready for Samsung Unpacked?
stories.Description: Exciting new devices are on the horizon, including the latest foldable phones and the Galaxy Watch 6 series. Don't miss the live stream on July 26.
stories.Tweet: Are you ready for Samsung Unpacked?  📦 Exciting new devices are on the horizon, including the latest foldable phones and the Galaxy Watch 6 series. Don't miss the live stream on July 26. #samsung https://www.zdnet.com/article/how-to-watch-samsung-unpacked-2023/

stories.Title: Calling all visionaries!
stories.Description: Eligible developers can now apply for Apple's Vision Pro Developer Kit. This exclusive opportunity comes with code-level support and first-hand access to this revolutionary device.
stories.Tweet: Calling all visionaries! 📦 Eligible developers can now apply for Apple's Vision Pro Developer Kit. This exclusive opportunity comes with code-level support and first-hand access to this revolutionary device. #apple https://9to5mac.com/2023/07/24/apple-vision-pro-developer-kit/

stories.Title: Stellantis and Samsung move forward
stories.Description: Both companies are collaborating on a new battery gigafactory, set to operate in 2027. This move represents a notable advancement in their electrification efforts.
stories.Tweet: Stellantis and Samsung move forward 📦 Both companies are collaborating on a new battery gigafactory, set to operate in 2027. This move represents a notable advancement in their electrification efforts. #stellantis https://cleantechnica.com/2023/07/25/stellantis-samsung-sdi-to-build-2nd-battery-gigafactory-in-usa/

stories.Title: Customize your browsing
stories.Description: Arc 1.0 by The Browser Company is now available for Mac users. Introducing unique features, including Boosts that allow personalization of the look and layout of websites.
stories.Tweet: Customize your browsing 📦 Arc 1.0 by The Browser Company is now available for Mac users. Introducing unique features, including Boosts that allow personalization of the look and layout of websites. #arc https://www.engadget.com/the-arc-personalized-web-browser-is-now-available-to-everyone-140015020.html
